common.views module

class common.views.TaskView(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: rest_framework.views.APIView

get(request, task_id)[source]

Get task status and result.

Field state corresponds to celery.states (see https://docs.celeryq.dev/en/stable/reference/celery.states.html).

A status of STARTED means that the task has started. A status of SUCCESS means that the task has finished successfully. A status of FAILURE means that the task has failed.

The response contains a field result only if the task has finished successfully.

Field result depends on the task. Usually it is a dictionary. See the description of endpoint that initializes the task (e.g. /api/v1/patients/load-patients/).
